Description.Text: The splendid Aparthotel HSM Madrigal complex, located in Paguera in the southern area of Majorca Island, offers a pleasant atmosphere that makes guests feel right at home. Aparthotel HSM Madrigal is situated in a calm area of Paguera, only 150 m from the wonderful Tora beach.The aparthotel complex HSM Madrigal will reopen in april 2008 after a complete refurbishment. The reformation includes the complete restyling of the exterior facade, which will be painted in warm terracotta colors, giving a mediterranean touch to the building. The balconies and terraces, as well as the interior of the apartments and studios will also be reformed. Parquet floor, Air conditioning (with cooling and heating function), modern kitchen, a bathroom designed with the newest tendencies…., an enjoyable atmosphere, which will make your stay at the aparthotel HSM Madrigal just unforgetable. All double rooms equipped with bathroom, hairdryer, air conditioning or heating, safety deposit box, telephone, Sat-TV and balcony. The Calvià district is located in the western part of Majorca Island covering an area of 145 square km and it is one of the most attractive areas on the Majorcan coastline. Calvià, which is the Paguera’s municipality, is a privileged district of Majorca offering a variety of landscapes including impressive mountain scenery and a beautiful coastline of beaches, sandy coves and cliffs. Paguera is characterised by a special microclimate, which offers the best temperatures of the island during winter. Aparthotel HSM Madrigal is just a short distance from Paguera’s boulevard, which offers a variety of entertainment options and a shopping centre. In addition, water sports facilities can be found at the beach, 15 clay surface tennis courts are available in town and an 18-hole golf course is located only 5 km from the hotel. Let yourself be surprised by the charm of Paguera, a fantastic place in Majorca Island. The Aparthotel HSM Madrigal welcomes you.
